scripts.create-local-graph: wait-on http-get://127.0.0.1:8000 && graph create purple-warlock/purple-warlock --node http://127.0.0.1:8020
scripts.deploy-local-graph: graph codegen && wait-on http://127.0.0.1:5001/api/v0/version http-get://127.0.0.1:8000 && graph deploy purple-warlock/purple-warlock --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020
scripts.deploy-graph: dotenv -- cross-var graph deploy --access-token $THEGRAPH_TOKEN purple-warlock/purple-warlock --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --debug
